document.heading: John Lewis Elementary School Designation Emergency Act of 2021
To designate, on an emergency basis, the school in Lot 0814 in Square 2806, at 1335 Farragut Place N.W., as the John Lewis Elementary School.
document.text: BE IT ENACTED BY THE COUNCIL OF THE DISTRICT OF COLUMBIA, That this act may be cited as the "John Lewis Elementary School Designation Emergency Act of 2021".

section.text: Pursuant to sections 401 and 422(b) through (e) of the Street and Alley Closing and Acquisition Procedures Act of 1982, effective March 10, 1983 (D.C. Law 4-201; D.C. Official Code §§ 9-204.01 and 9-204.22) ("Act"), and notwithstanding section 422(a) of the Act, the Council designates the school in Lot 0814 in Square 2806, at 1335 Farragut Place, N.W., as the "John Lewis Elementary School".

codify:emergency.action: designation of the school in Lot 0814 in Square 2806, at 1335 Farragut Place, N.W., as the "John Lewis Elementary School"

section.heading: Fiscal impact statement.
section.text: The Council adopts the fiscal impact statement in the committee report for the John Lewis Elementary School Designation Act of 2021, as introduced on July 6, 2021 (Bill 24-339), as the fiscal impact statement required by section 4a of the General Legislative Procedures Act of 1975, approved October 16, 2006 (120 Stat. 2038; D.C. Official Code § 1-301.47a).

section.heading: Effective date.
section.text: This act shall take effect following approval by the Mayor (or in the event of veto by the Mayor, action by the Council to override the veto), a 30-day period of congressional review as provided in section 602(c)(1) of the District of Columbia Home Rule Act, approved December 24, 1973 (87 Stat. 813; D.C. Official Code §1-206.02(c)(1)), and publication in the District of Columbia Register.
